## NavigationFailure interface

Extended Error that contains extra information regarding a failed navigation.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface NavigationFailure extends Error 
```
<b>Extends:</b> Error

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [from](./reactivuety.navigationfailure.from.md) | [RouteLocationNormalized](./reactivuety.routelocationnormalized.md) | Route location we were navigating from |
|  [to](./reactivuety.navigationfailure.to.md) | [RouteLocationNormalized](./reactivuety.routelocationnormalized.md) | Route location we were navigating to |
|  [type](./reactivuety.navigationfailure.type.md) | ErrorTypes.NAVIGATION\_CANCELLED \| ErrorTypes.NAVIGATION\_ABORTED \| ErrorTypes.NAVIGATION\_DUPLICATED | Type of the navigation. One of [NavigationFailureType](./reactivuety.navigationfailuretype.md) |
